name: The Puppeteer - It Is Not Real
name_original: The Puppeteer - It Is Not Real
description:
A short P.T. inspired game made for Brackeys Gamejam 2022.1.

The theme for the gamejam is "It is not real". In this game you walk through a set of hallways, which change slightly everytime you enter the hallway again. Are the horrors real or is it not real? 

That's for you to find out!
